org.mixare
Class NetworkDataSource

java.lang.Object
  org.mixare.DataSource
      org.mixare.NetworkDataSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
GooglePlacesDataSource, WikipediaDataSource
public abstract class NetworkDataSource
extends DataSource

This abstract class should be extended for new data sources. It has many methods to get and parse data from numerous web sources.

Author:
Justin Wetherell
